title: This place sets the standard for great hotels
desc: What a magnificent hotel. We stayed in both a garden room and a valley wing room for a week. Both excellent. We had a few small issues but the hotel attended to them quickly and effectively. The only negative about the hotel is it’s proximity to the MTR. Taxis are cheap, but the MTR is amazing. You need to walk about 1km to the MTR in the heat or rain. Not that pleasant. We are onsite twice and the food is excellent. Would come here again without thinking twice.

title: Awesome time at Waterfall
desc: I had a great time at the Waterfall. The food was superb. Andreano, Simone, Gwen, Loges and Nash provided amazing service. Met Swaran and Joan at the reception and they were extremely welcoming. We will definitely be back!

title: Best Hotel for Family
desc: The best hotel experience especially for family. Great customer service, great facilities and great food options for an enjoyable and relaxing stay! Check in was smooth, room was ready the moment we checked in at 3pm. Wanted to have high tea at The Rose Veranda, front desk immediately make a reservation us. They had offered to send our bags to the room for us while we proceed to the restaurant to have our high tea! My child was happily engaged by all the friendly staffs from the hotel! My yearly affair with Shangri-La and i am never disappointed!

title: Superb service with guest needs in mind
desc: I had 2 separate reservations back to back. The first one was accorded higher privileges and the 2nd didn’t. In order not to inconvenience me, the check in staff helped arranged for both nights with the same room type as day 1. The service was good as usual and the room was clean. We had a great stay and ended dinning in the hotel on all 3 days to enjoy the service and food. The pool was very inviting even though the weather wasn’t and the kids had great fun at both the regular pool and the splash.

title: Family staycation.
desc: Shangri-La orchard or sentosa will always be in my top list for staycation with my family. They have superb services; buffet BF is awesome too. The scenery is great too.! In room dining is marvelous!

title: Big thank you to Head Concierge Raj Kumar
desc: Great hotel. Really comfortable and in a great location. I’m especially indebted to the Head Concierge, Raj Kumar, and his colleagues who found my mobile phone when I left it in the room & sent it back to me at Changi airport in good time. Thank you so much!

title: AMAZING
desc: Wonderful food and service by Andreano, Simone, Gwen, Loges, Nesh! Will definitely be back for the food and drinks! Front desk staff and lobby staff were super friendly and amiable. Atmosphere and location tip top!

title: 5 STARS REVIEW
desc: Amazing service at the Waterfall! Delicious food! I’ll be back again! Great environment! Friendly staff from front office! Definitely 5 stars review! All thanks to Andreano, Simone, Gwen, Loges & Nesh!

title: Amazing!
desc: From the moment we checked in, we fell in love with this hotel. The service was amazing, the rooms and amenities are so accommodating to families. Kimi at the front desk was amazing and she helped us so much! We will definitely be returning.

title: Outstanding hotel, such great staff
desc: An outstanding hotel, so clean, staff super friendly, attentive and efficient. Well situated for moving around using MTR and you may think it will be expensive but surprisingly not, we would most definitely use again.

title: Memorable Birthday Staycation at Valley WIng 🎂
desc: We did a 2D1N (check-in 2023-06-17, check-out 2023-06-18) at Valley Wing. It was a pleasant birthday and unforgettable staycation. The staff was very friendly and attentive. The breakfast at the Summit room, afternoon tea, evening canapes and free-flow drinks were excellent. The room was large and well-furnished and had a good view. One downside will be the pillow. It would be great to provide a pillow menu for guests to choose in advance/during check-in. Thank you to all staff, and in particular, Mr. G.Kumar for the birthday song and chocolates, and Ms. Michelle Wong who gave us a late checkout. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay with you and hope to return again soon.

title: A wonderful hotel and fantastic service - thank you!
desc: Dear Kumar, Carlo, Hassan, Jega and wider Shangri-La team. Thank you so much for the kind hospitality during my recent visit to Singapore. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay with you and hope to return again soon. On my first evening, upon learning this was my first time in Singapore, Hassan provided an overview of places to visit, provided a local map and information on sights to see. Further, Hassan also provided a complementary ticket to local museums and galleries, which I used on multiple occasions during my visit. Both Carlo and Kumar were a huge help and ever present face when arriving and departing Shangri-La. Both provided a very warm welcome, providing assistance with travel throughout my stay and guidance on the best places to eat and visit. Nothing was too much

title: Great facilities, terrible service
desc: Writing this on our last full day here. We’ve loved the hotel facilities. The pool is amazing for children and adults alike. The garden view room we were appointed is spacious, in good repair, modern and the beds are very comfortable. The fold out couch is absolutely perfect for a young child as it acts like a toddler bed with the arm rests being higher so that the child doesn’t fall out of bed. The food has been amazing and the buffet breakfast is great, with something for everyone. The only downside we’ve experienced and this is a big one for us is the lack of service. When checking in we weren’t told about where any of the hotels amenities are and so we’ve had to discover or ask about them ourselves. We had no idea where the different restaurants were or what they

title: Amazing
desc: I am so thankful for George Cobbs help at the shangrii la 35th floor. He was above and beyond with help around the city!!! We will be back and certainly look for him soon…so we can bring back a gift! Te tea experience was also remarkable

title: Best experience at the Valley Wing
desc: The staff at the Valley Wing were the best. A huge shout out to Pamela, Hafiz, Nila, Jasmine, Iris, Khai, Sammy and Elvis. Everyone made us feel at home. I will be back to the Valley Wing - the food quality at breakfast was also much better at Valley wing compared to The Line. The Line is for variety of food catered to the masses but in terms of quality - it pales in comparison. Valley wing had the best quality fruits for every breakfast - blueberries, raspberries, cherries.

title: Fabulous stay!
desc: Did a 3D2N staycation with the family during the school holidays and has a wonderful stay in the Valley Wing. I would say this is the best hotel experience I had even when I’m Accor Diamond and Marriott Titanium member. Shangri-la Singapore and especially it’s Valley Wing is exceptional!! And all these won’t happen without the superb service of the staff who are Raja, Kumar, Peggy and everyone single one in Valley Wing. Their familiar faces makes us feel very welcomed and we always leave this hotel looking forward to our next. The kids had a fabulous time and we will be back again end of this year .

title: Beautiful hotel!
desc: Great hotel with friendly and helpful staff. It has great facilities and very clean. The breakfast is delicious and plenty of selections to choose from. Our room has nice view and quiet. It is located close to Orchard Street, which is quite convenient for shopping.

title: The best hotel for breakfast, pool and business in the world
desc: The staff, facilities , location, pool setting and the breakfast are all superb. This was my first trip back to my most favourite hotel in the world since COVID . The refurb foyer and the redone rooms were fantastic . The Origin Grill and bar were a welcome respite after a long hot day without having to leave the hotel to find a good intimate drinking hole.

title: Highly recommended
desc: Excellent service all around starting from lobby entrance greeted by cheerful Mr. G Kumar everyday. Quiet surroundings but still a walking distance from the buzzing Orchard Road. Wide selection of dining options.

title: Best hotel in Singapore with beautiful grounds.
desc: Beautiful linen, excellent service, love the pool and gym, can walk easily to Orchard Rd. I use the gym every day and the pool is long enough to swim early morning laps. I enjoy the Horizon Club and the service there as elsewhere in the hotel is exceptional. I have even received the odd upgrade. Great for solo, couple and family travel. Easy to walk/ run to Botanical Gardens.

title: Mixed bag this time.
desc: This trip did not go as flawlessly as the last in March 2022. It was very much a hotel in two parts, The Valley wing in which we stayed in and the summit room were for the most part top notch. In particular we would like to Danish, Raja, Peggy, Marvin, Tiffany, Fera and Chris who looked after us like family. On the rooms side a big thank you to Johanna who helped us and our family who travelled from Australia out no end and no request was too hard, Elvis was always there to greet us and help with luggage or shopping. Once again the Waterfall restaurant disappointed although we were in the private dining room with staff walking by every minute on the way to the kitchen, are plates were left uncleared, we had to flag staff down if we wanted anything, for what you pay this is

title: Great service and handling problems
desc: Despite the chaotic mis arrangements @ from the hotel I want to say thanx to WEN JIE, and Zoe Ang for all the babysitting and special arrangements. you both had been great listeners to the customer feedback and compliance. The speedy actions to resolve the issue and problems was impeccable! Thanx Paul for the great ice coffee from the executive lounge. It is amazing! I looking forward to seeing you all on my next business trip! Bravo! Brian lee

title: Valley Wing is the best
desc: My friends and I stayed in the Valley Wing. The experience and service there was as excellent as ever. I always stay in the VW at the Shangri-La when I visit Singapore, it’s my absolute favorite. The location, accommodation, amenities, and wonderful staff in the VW are second to none. Highly recommend.

title: great hotel with excellent customer service
desc: The hotel is beautiful and has great facilities, although we would have liked an adult only pool. The customer service is excellent and we thoroughly enjoyed the drinks and food at both the bar and in The Valley Wing. The Valley Wing was particularly beautiful to stay in and the staff were great, particularly Pravin who was so friendly and helpful. Thank you!

title: First Class Hotel
desc: We stayed at the Shangri-La, Singapore for 3 nights on our way to Koh Samui. We were greeted on arrival by wonderful door staff and reception staff who were so friendly and helpful. Nothing seemed too much trouble for them and we were made to feel welcome and relaxed after a long overnight flight. Our room was perfect. Large double bed for us and a very comfortable bed / settee for our son. Complimentary water was placed in the room each day and there was a nice coffee pod machine. The bathroom was spacious with complimentary l’Occitane bath products available and replenished each day. Towels were of a high quality. The room was cleaned each day to a very high standard. Breakfast was incredible! The range of food was the best we’ve ever experienced and all of a really high

title: Family and kids friendly 5 stars hotel with amazing indoor playground and water play area.
desc: I had the pleasure of staying at Shangri-La Singapore Hotel with my family since February 2022, and I cannot express enough how impressed I am with the exceptional service provided by the hotel staff, particularly Ashvinder my daughter favourite front desk jie jie and the managers, Jack, Wenjie and Lionel. Their dedication, attentiveness, and warm hospitality truly made our stay unforgettable. From the moment we arrived, they went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and satisfaction. Whether it was arranging special requests, offering local recommendations, or simply checking in to make sure everything was perfect, the staff consistently exceeded our expectations. Their genuine care and personal touch truly made us feel like valued guests. The entire staff at Shangri-La

title: Great Ambience and Facilities
desc: Great 5 day stay in the garden wing. This hotel has a sense of space and class also with spacious and well appointed rooms. The tennis courts are in great condition and the fitness facility is well equipped. The guys at the pool bar were my favourite for good service of food and drinks (and thanks for knowing my name each time). Origins Bar is also good - try the Harris Gin! I greatly appreciated guest services delivering a birthday cake - many thanks. One manager was particularly friendly and welcoming - I don't have his name but he is American but previously lived in Aberdeen, Scotland. The ambience of this resort hotel is brilliant and yet close to the city and indeed the wonderful botanic gardens. We will stay again.

title: A True 5 Star, but needs to work on customer centricity.
desc: A True 5 star, it has all the amenities and flavours of luxury. Nice and quite location, 10 minutes walk can bring you righ in the middle of mall culture of Singapore. Highly recommended for families with kids. Now few issues - 1. Pool - Great for kids, huge, but absolutely no go for people who wants to do a bit of a lap. Always full and the shape and size does not allow for that 2. Food choices in the in room dining Menu is limited. 3. The restaurants in the hotel are quite popular and you can't find a place for yourself if you just feel like walking down to any of the restaurants and eat the food of your choice. Always pre booked. They need to find a way for inhouse guests. 4. Room cleaning - I noticed few inconsistency. Not a huge problem though. 5. Rules - I just

title: A great experience
desc: Our stay was fantastic. A big thank you to all in the Horizon lounge, especially Viola and Gary. The service was great, the housekeeping staff do a brilliant job and always have a smile. A thank you to Kim who happily is assisting in fixing our one very small issue. A truly five star hotel.

title: Excellent service and amazing staff!.
desc: Arrive at 8pm approx to the check in counter. When it came to making a payment, their merchant card reader machine was faulty and declined although through their accounts system, it was found payment was approved. during this time and as it was frustrating trying to souce funds to cover payment, Tiffany was composed and handled the situation perfectly with payment issues. She followed protocol as per hotel guidelines and still displayed a positive attitude during the ordeal. Lawrence should also be commended for being attentive and comforted our 3 tired kids while we were having check issues after a long flight arriving at night. He was the only one, as well as Tiffany who made every effort to make our kids happy. As a working hospitality employee myself, we are happy with the

title: Flooding bathroom
desc: The bathroom had a shower curtain .Every time I bathed the bathroom was full of water .Had to use towels on floor to soak water up.Terrible experience.For the price we pay we expect good service .Greatly disappointed

title: Shangri La
desc: My stay in Shangri La was exceptional. Unbelievable beautiful and breathtaking interior in the lobby with lots of art. Everything was on point, service was always quick,friendly & helpful. I’m more than happy! Jega helped me with my luggage & transfer to the airport Very pro active staff. Highly recommended

title: Lovely experience
desc: Had a 3 night stay, beautiful hotel and surroundings. staff helpful and friendly atmosphere very good customer service from Asher and Kumar who arranged transport and gave advice and information. Selina at front desk was also welcoming and polite. Pool.area wasn't overcrowded ,waterfall and garden area lovely to look at. Fish swimming in waterfall area giving an ambience which was very tranquil and calming

title: A wonderful evening at the Waterfall restaurant.
desc: We had dinner at the Waterfall Restaurant and had a wonderful evening. The food and the ambience was superb. And the service, especially from Julius was excellent. He was attentive to our every need and obliged us with our requests to take photos for us. The restaurant also gave a birthday cake to my son which we did not expect. All in all a very pleasant and enjoyable evening.

title: Find your Shangri-la
desc: Come with us through the whimsical world of Shangri-La, where your personal paradise awaits. Like their brand campaign "find your Shangri-la" suggests, you will find something memorable to mark your stay there. There are 3 wings to choose from: Garden Wing (haven for family with children) Tower Wing (sophistication without loosing its roots) Valley Wing (legacy) Recommend: Club rooms at Tower Wing as their rooms were refurbished. Junior Suite room 1523 offered unblocked city view and access to Horizon Club Lounge at level 24. The room is suitable for triple sharing (1 king size bed and 1 sofa bed). Club lounge offers afternoon tea at 2pm and evening cocktails from 5pm to 7pm. The spread for evening cocktails is good enough as dinner if you are not a big eater. The spread of

title: Great family trip
desc: Staff was polite and helpful. Room was comfortable and kids enjoyed the Buds and Splash so much. Location is good which is at the centre of Singapore. The breakfast at the Line was great which has variety of food. Also, the lunch at the Lobby was delicious.

title: Just go there
desc: It was from the beginning till the end an great visit. Extreme friendly personal. We stayed at The Valley wing The high tea and the evening champagne lounge was just awesome. We have been there for the fourth time AND we come again

title: Wen Jie saved the day!
desc: A revisit to Shangrila Singapore and this time at their Tower Wing Junior Suite and to try out Horizon club. Cocktail and canapé are served from 5-7pm and having breakfast here is also not too bad. Otherwise can go to the main breakfast area The Line but it was super crowded during my stay. There are many teething problems and thankfully Wen Jie (reception manager) resolved it for me. The staff at Horizon Club are lovely and thanks to Putri, Ella & Paul. You will have to be wearing covered shoes to enter this lounge so remember to bring a pair of shoes. Hopefully, my next visit will have a smoother experience at Shangrila Singapore.

title: Dylan’s service on membership benefits
desc: Dylan was wonderful in explaining about the Shangri-La Circle and was extremely helpful in sharing more on the benefits of the programme. I will definitely bring my family here to Shangri-La Singapore again.

title: Perfect for work or pleasure
desc: From the moment we arrived until we left, we were in for a treat. A great base like this sets up a great holiday. Stunning pool area, big rooms with fantastic facilities. Great gym with lots of equipment and Amazing shower and change facilities. Food and beverage is fantastic from cafe to restaurant. Loved the breakfast. One thing we lived is that if anyone puts out their towel and disappears, staff will remove the towels so you don’t find yourself coming to the pool and not finding a sun lounge. The gardens around the pool and hotel are beautiful. Special thanks to Sunny who cleaned our room everyday, left little goodies for the kids and was just so friendly. Sad to leave that’s for sure. Highly recommended!

title: Shangri-la’s Hidden Gem ~ The Valley Wing
desc: I took the Romantic Indulgence to celebrate the anniversary. The manager, Amin, handled my check-in seamlessly although the room wasn’t ready when I arrived. He is very friendly, warm, hospitable and helpful. While waiting for our room, being the guests at Valley Wing, we were invited to help ourselves to the afternoon high tea which came with cocktail or the usual coffee/tea selection. Food served here at The Summit was delectable. There is a certain class of luxury and comfort when staying in the Valley Wing. Firstly, it is located at another side with its own reception, restaurant, driveway, lobby and team of service staff. It is peaceful and quiet unlike the noisier main tower. The rooms and furnishing has a very upper English class feel . Even the room toiletries are

title: Not the Shangri la experience ex expected 😌
desc: Shangri la - 5 star hotel and expectations for high tea worth 88++ would be team gives u attention a bit and serves u well - none happened - the team was so stressed serving as if they were doing favor serving us … missed the orders, had to be reminded repeated of orders, not able to give any attention for food or offering, did not care to explain the food in the tiers what they are ! No smile on face of any single waiter or waitress in lounge no welcoming smile - wrong order delivery … “sorry these things are not available as we ran out “ hmm interesting experience not a Shangri la experience !! Other hotels are catching up seems complacency is creeping in hotel staff of being the best - well there is constant competition and not far is the day Shangri la experience woild not

title: Great couple's getaway and indulgence.
desc: Booked the Romantic Couple Indulgence and had a great time. The deluxe room was luxurious and the food was fantastic! Service staff are friendly and helpful. The spa was relaxing and you can shower after the massage. Be mindful of the time for the afternoon tea and drinks at the lounge. The food and drinks are unlimited within the meal time. The bed was huge and you can request for different kinds of pillows. Love the smell of the L'OCCITANE toiletries. Breakfast was scrumptious, with a good buffet spread and 2 orders from their menu. We enjoyed ourselves immensely and would go again.

title: Definitely recommend for families
desc: We had a pool view room on level 3 which is really lobby level. The two kids slept on the sofa bed. Super comfy king bed for us. The splash area dor the kids was great and having Buds to take care of the kids meant we could have some free time. Definitely recommend for families. Super stylish hotel, a real.oasis in the city. Good food and drinks. But coffee could be better.

title: Great experience
desc: I had a wonderful time at the Shangri-La. All the team were helpful, the facilities were even better this time than when I first visited 10 years before. Special mention to Kumar who you’ll see in traditional clothes to greet you at the door. He’s a gentleman and a real reflection of this great place.

title: Fantastic!!!!
desc: We stayed in the Valley Wing of this hotel. The staff are first class, just amazing!!! The food, service, cleanliness and attention to detail is second to none. It is the third time we have been here in 12 months as it is so relaxing and wonderful. I can’t speak highly enough of the Valley Wing at Shangri-La. A place to certainly visit is the Waterfall, Chef Simone is magnificent and his staff are fabulous. The food is amazing. I can’t rate this hotel high enough. Once again the staff in Valley Wing are amazing!!!

title: Excellent
desc: Excellent, impeccable, discrete..... An oasis. Best pool ever. All facilities. Flexible. Forthcoming. Elegance is an understatement. A place for ultimate relaxation in a busy city. Situated in the middle of the most attractive part of town.

title: Extravagance in a Great Location
desc: The Shangri-La has fantastic service and is in a great location. The pool is beautiful and not usually too crowded and there is a nice spa as well. Some highlights are the breakfast buffet and the seafood extravaganza on Thursday nights, it's really spectacular and shouldn't be missed. The hotel is only a short walk to one of the larger shopping areas nearby. I look forward to returning on my next visit to Singapore.

title: Relaxing afternoon
desc: We have a great time having some coffee and tea and try some snacks. Was really surprise how tasty the food was . Every food served in our table was heavenly our favourites are Katong laksa and Ong Bak Pau. Calamansi lemonade was refreshingly good. Special Thanks to Paul, Wendy and Rosie for a wonderful service . We will defenitely come back.

title: 10 years over regular guest
desc: Always the best! Renovated clean and huge room! Special shangri la smell in the lobby area, shang is always the best choice in Singapore. Pay add more upon check in and stay garden-wing with balcony always the best choice. Big pool huge breakfast, friendly staff and door man& bell man ( uncles are the best) would love to stay again! Shuttle to train station very convenience.

title: Company Anniversary Event
desc: My company had an event last Saturday 15 July 2023. We did our event at Shangri-La Hotel, Island Ballroom. Everyone had a great night and everything went well and smoothly. I would like to thank Koonmeng and the team for handling my event and doing a great job preparing for the event. David and the team did a great job as well as David made sure that the event went smoothly during the event. They are so professional and easy to communicate with. Surely we will come back to have a company event again in the future. Awesome and great people to work with.

title: Wonderful Staff at Shangri -La Singapore
desc: Shangri La - Singapore is one of the best hotels in the world. Few staff members who has made us feel feel at home. We met some wonderful people and appreciate their kindness ! Kumar was like a sunshine at the entrance, Ashvider's excellent customer service skills, Chandran Iyappan's tasty food from Indian Restaurant, Waiter Mukilan's friendly attitude and the desire to help people , Sharma at the baggage storage room more and more which we cant describe in words.

title: Excellent in all aspects
desc: The room was specious, has all things you need. The bed was super comfortable. Very nice break fast and more than wonderful “high tea afternoon”. The main thing that I liked that how the hotel staff treated you, they were very professional and hospitable with my family and myself. I truly felt a 5 stars hotel.

title: Wonderful stay in beautiful and classy yet isolated hotel
desc: Went to Shangri-La today, entering Valley Wing after long walk to the hotel Greeted by doorman who led me to sit at table where manager attend to me She briefed me and then ask for my credit card , whom she swiped $990 from my card. ( I already sent $1580 online via Shangri-La app one day before- $790 room price + $790 room deposit ) and reception mgr swiped my card for another $990 deposit? ( i know Hotel finance department will just bill me $790 ( hotel stay) + $43 ( pool bar F&B) +$7 fruit snack from Shop House) She take me to room at level 7 Very nice room and classy too There is a bird stand 20 mins later, went to 3rd storey to go to pool large area with crowds , even got life guards. Sitting on side of pool, then swim for a while before going to my seat and order

title: Great hospitality and kids friendly hotel
desc: First family staycation was so memorable! Many thanks to Ms Joan Seng for the great hospitality and little sweet surprises for my girl. Breakfast options were extensive too. We will definitely be back again.

title: Another great stay
desc: Another great stay at the Shangri La Singapore. On arrival at 7am we were able to check into our rooms early at no extra cost which make a massive difference after a long flight from London. Staff are attentive and cannot do enough, any request is dealt with efficiently and to a high standard. Location is great to explore the city, Orchard MRT is a 15 min walk or SGD 10 taxi. The real plus for us though is the resort style pool which we use to relax either before or after heading out to explore.

title: 5 stars
desc: Great location and great staff, especially the pool staff that serve the drinks and food. Navin and Ravikumar helped out the most. Perfect location, very central. I have travelled the world and by far, this buffet is the best I’ve ever been to. Will be back here

title: Luxury with family appeal
desc: Great stay; tower rooms were contemporary - we had interconnecting rooms which worked well. Buffet breakfast was fabulous and pool lovely. Suheha did a great job of looking after us. Overall an oasis in the city and very family friendly.

title: Poor pool conditions
desc: The swimmimg pool is terrible. Water is cloudy, i cannot see the tiles at all. Water is slimy and can see algae and dirt with yr googles on. If the pool is down, pls close to pool to avoid children from getting sick

title: An absolute pleasure.
desc: This is our favourite hotel in the world and it keeps getting better. We spent two weeks here in August. This is our first time in The Tower (we usually stay in Garden Wing but it was booked out) and we also chose to upgrade to Horizon Club thinking it was a little indulgent but I would definitely do it again. Value-wise I think it paid for itself. The entire stay has been flawless from start to (nearly - we check out today) finish. The check in experience made us feel very special even though we arrived about 6 hours before we had indicated on our booking (we changed flights and I forgot to update my ETA on booking). I’d also booked under two different names and done a few other things to make things confusing. It was all sorted without us even asking. Our Club room in the

title: Exceptional hotel
desc: Absolutely amazing hotel, highly recommend. Stunning lobby, great breakfast and lovely staff. Jega and Kumar are a real credit to the hotel. Exceptional customer service from both, they made our stay extra special and made us feel so welcome.

title: Best Hotel to stay in Singapore
desc: The hotel is located in a quiet area, but not far from Orchard Road. When the Sun had set, we would walk to Isetann or Ion Orchard to have dinner. Our room was cleaned daily. The bed and pillows were very comfortable and with clean, good quality sheet, comforter, and pillowcases. The toiletries were L' Occitane, Jasmin scent. We enjoyed our baths and showers because the water was abundant and the pressure was strong. They provided enough drinking water, coffee, tea, etc. The hotel staff were attentive and favorably responded to our requests. We especially loved the bellman Carlo, a Filipino. He was very warm and sincere in greeting us and asking how we were doing? He was attentive to our needs and was our go-to-guy whenever we needed advice or information. He made us

title: Excellent Service!
desc: The person who checked us in, walked us to our room. I thought that was above and beyond. Loved the fruit plate when we arrived. The morning buffett was excellent. The location was good, just a 7 minute walk from Ion Orchard.

title: Great dinner and memorable experience
desc: Went there with friends for a joint celebratory dinner for two people's birthdays at once. Food and presentation were great, it all tasted and looked amazing. There wasn't really anything negative to talk about as the staff serving us were really friendly and answered all of our questions we had regarding items on the menu. If I remember correctly we had a total of one hostess (Olivia) and three waiters/waitresses (Paul, Nesh and Sarah) who all contributed to phenomenal overall experience. Really enjoyed my time there!

title: Great mini getaway
desc: The service is fantastic here, from the buffet breakfast, the little incidentals when they artiste have never been an issue. Spent most days by the pool bar and the crew out there were brilliant Sasi, Navin and Ravi Kumar catered to our every whim

title: Amazing pool experience with family
desc: I love this hotel. Especially the lap pool. Swimming my laps there at 2 pm was a magical experience. The pools are very clean and it was the best stay here. The restaurant water is amazing. Rooms are very comfortable, breakfast buffet quite extensive and good. Will come back for sure

title: Love pool bar people
desc: Love Shangrila-la with kids , speacialy at the pool with SaSi, Thary and Ravi Khumar, they always give my kids ice cream, and they are so I ter ta I g with them ! the best u can have in Singapore 😉 lovely people and service

title: Experience in staying in the hotel
desc: First encountered with card access unable to scan.Second encountered room unable to charged the device,we came to celebrated our wedding anniversary,last year we went to Sentosa Shangri-La no problem.

title: Power and Airconditioning shut off in the middle of the night. Poor service recovery
desc: Our staycation in 2021 was fantastic. Sadly our recent one here was less than desirable. We booked a 2 night stay at the garden wing to celebrate our birthdays. 1st night went without a glitch. Unfortunately, on the 2nd night we were awoken at 330 am when we realised the power to our room had gone off and the air conditioning was shut down. We tried to turn the power on but could not. Telephone lines were also down. Left with no choice, we decided to march down to the hotel lobby in our pajamas at 4am to ask the receptionist for assistance. She apologied and advised that somebody will be sent up to resolve the issue. We waited in our room til 5am and nobody was at sight. At this point we were seriously tired and fell asleep, only to be woken up at 630am when the power and

title: Excellent stay
desc: Staff were very friendly and helpful Room was great and very clean Outlook to the pool was a lovely view Breakfast food was great and lots of variety Taxi team were outstanding Would fully recommend this hotel for a stay Spa service was also great

title: Shangri-La Singapore
desc: I stayed in Valley Wings shangrila Singapore Hotel with my family: two adults and four children. We really enjoyed all hotel’s facilities and especial thanks and regards for Irs, khair, Ameen and Pravin also one last gentleman I forgot his name( the youngest employee in the hotel 24 years old) for making our vacation amazing and wonderful.

title: Exceptional service in the valley wing
desc: Excellent hotel with fantastic staff. Soban Raja and Khair were always there for us and no request was ever to difficult. They always make it feel like home. I highly recommend it here and the valley wing is a cut above the rest. It’s definitely a hotel you should stay at when visiting Singapore

title: Way overpriced
desc: Nice hotel but way overpriced for a resort that its maximum entertainment is the nice pool and nothing else is usable when it comes to entertainment. The adult activities are too old and not for my kids generation or even mine, the kids activities are also not attractive at all. The beach activities are also less than average and we rarely saw people using them. The room is smaller than any room I've ever stayed in but the bed quality is good. All the staff are really nice and willing always to help with a smile. One final thing that I didn't like is when they asked for SDG95/per night to guarantee having connected rooms which is something that I never faced in my whole life and I could not understand how they can only guarantee that only by extra money. Is this something

title: An Oasis in Singapore
desc: The Horizon club was wonderful place to stay to explore Singapore. The club was incredibly well hosted and managed by Paul , whilst his team , including but not limited to , Sheryl and Viola provided impeccable service with a small and a warm welcome. The all day refreshments were well enjoyed , whilst both the breakfast and cocktail in the lounge provided a great variety of excellent food and drinks The can do attitude was evident throughout right down to the thoughtful weather predictions by Sheryl. We loved our stay and look forward to returning

title: Shangri La hotel…. Always great
desc: Arrival experience …5/5 …felt welcome… asked for an upgrade to horizon club… and got it although the price was a bit steep. Room… 4/5… nice room although no bathtube Lobby and surroundings… 5/5… Amazing! Swimming pool…5/5 …Amazing… best pool in the world to swim in the evening… great temperature and awesome jacuzzi… Employees…5/5…great Breakfast…1/5 …dissappointed with the line… average breakfast…not even had nasi goreng… Japanese good was average..only had 1 sort of sushi…no sashimi…much Indian food… but overall not worth it…. Horizon club…. 4/5… Nice friendly employees… drinks good…singapore sling was great… food very average…. Many things with coneflowers… the snacks were average…cheese was ok…

title: Great Hotel
desc: My family and I have stayed at the Shangri-La Singapore 3 times, the last 2 times it has been myself and my wife and another couple we are friends with. I can thoroughly recommend this hotel, it is in a great location, a short walk to the Orchard Road shopping precinct and the hotel facilities are second to none. The staff bend over backwards to look after you and nothing is too much for them. I can highly recommend this hotel and we are looking forward to our next stay next year. Tim O'Halloran Henley Beach South, South Australia, Australia

title: Pool side bar Shangri-La Singapore
desc: We enjoyed a relaxing morning by the pool and a delicious lunch at the poolside bar. The service was excellent. Attentive with our needs met and anticipated, nothing was too much trouble. Thank you to our server Tharu Ravikumar

title: Recent stay at Shangri-la Singapore
desc: An excellent stay, rooms are very comfortable, staff are so friendly and efficient. Tiffany checked us in and she was so helpful, nothing was too much trouble for her to organise. Thank you Tiffany and Shangri-la!

title: Excellent Service
desc: "I'm absolutely thrilled to commend the Horizon Club team for their impeccable service and unwavering attention to detail. From the moment I arrived, Zoe and Joan went above and beyond to make my stay a true home away from home. Their warmth and professionalism created an unforgettable experience. Every aspect of my stay was flawlessly executed, and it's clear that the Horizon Club team is dedicated to excellence. The personalized care and genuine kindness of Zoe and Joan truly made this stay memorable. I can't thank them enough for their exceptional service!"🌹🌹

title: A sanctuary in Singapore
desc: A sanctuary in the middle of Singapore. A beautiful hotel surrounded by amazing gardens. Very family friendly with so many activities, fantastic pool areas and the most amazing kids club. The buffet breakfast was a highlight with so much choice and quality, All the staff were attentive and couldn't do enough for us. We booked a Luxury Escapes deal which was great value. We had a wonderful time for 6 nights, and just wished we could have stayed longer.

title: Lovely stay in the city
desc: We were very happy with the high quality of service received during our stay. Great option for families as they have a splash zone as well as an indoor play area. Many different options available for breakfast. They also have a great spa experience. We would love to come back in the future.

title: A pleasant stay
desc: The hotel felt very grand from entry. I love the traditional costume and was greeted warmly. It was surprising check in was so lengthy as I arrived around 8pm and had to wait around 15 mins in a line. My room was lovely, very spacious (especially by Singapore’s standards) and smelt so nice. I didn’t have family with me but the kids club and breakfast area was the best I’ve ever seen - by far! I would love to come back and have my daughter experience it. The pool was nice and a great temp. Breakfast was pretty average for a 5 star hotel - more like 3-4 for me. There was a wide range of cuisines but limited drinks and only machine coffee. For real coffee $7 from the cafe! Food was fresh but just didn’t compare to many other hotels I’ve stayed at. Checkout was quick and

title: Let kids into Horizon Club for weekdays
desc: My first staycation at Shangri-la was during CNY last year. We were so impressed with Ashvinder's service that went above and beyond that we visited again in Mar and it has been a monthly staycation since. Even our relatives that stayed in Shangri-la at our recommendation were also impressed by her. Our daughter will always ask for Ash and we really appreciate her touching gestures that make our girl so happy. We would also like to express our heartfelt thanks to Jack and Wenjie who always greet us warmly and handle our requests or feedback professionally. Even though I stay at Valley Wing frequently, I still prefer to check in or out at Tower Wing. However, Elvis among the personnel at Valley Wing really stands out. His smile and greetings really brighten our days. Raja is

title: Long wait for second room at check in
desc: Very poor check in process. We arrived before checkin which is 3pm fair enough the rooms were not ready but checkout is 12 so how much longer could it be. We had 2 rooms and got one assigned at 13.30. We now had all the luggage in 1 room without space to move and the second room nothing at 4pm and still waiting. Absolutely fuming can see people checking in around us it seems we should be happy with 1 out of 2 rooms!

title: Still very good
desc: My Sister and me stayed on Mid August 2023 in the Shangri-La Singapore. I familiar with the hotel from back days of the nineties of the 20th century. The legendary hotel that established the Shangri-la Hotel franchise is still VERY GOOD, But not Excellent or paradise as it was. Because we stayed only in this trip, in 3 different Shangri-la Hotels (Kowloon, Tokyo and Singapore), and we been in other Shangri-la hotels like London, Toronto, etc. you can definitely see the old ones like Singapore or Kowloon are not "Keeping the pace" with the chain NEW ONES like London or Tokyo. The breakfast is still spectacular and has many options for every taste. BUT, the service is no longer as efficient as it used to be. for example, we came back to the hotel on 15:30 hour but the room was

title: Nice Hotel a bit out of the way
desc: Too remote from the main action as you have to get a taxi or the shuttle which only runs between 11-4 . Hotel is very nice and rooms excellent service also very efficient. Would not stay here again as getting a taxi is a nightmare when in town you can wait for quite a while to get a taxi.

title: Lovely afternoon tea
desc: Came to have my baby shower and the food was amazing. Staff in the tea rooms seemed a little understaffed in the tea room which was a shame as it effected the level of the service! However the man who greeted us was amazing and super helpful with all our bags and helping me set up my baby shower etc. He was def the star of the show in terms of service and going the extra mile.

title: Incredible service!
desc: My wife and I stayed at the hotel for a few nights. The hotel and staff were great, but what specifically stood out to us was the experience of coming and going from the hotel. G. Kumar was a bright spot in many of our days, and is one of the few names/people we’ll remember from our trip!

title: Enjoyed the pool most!
desc: This hotel is fantastic. Perfectly located just off the main street, right in the middle of restaurants, bars, shops and only a 5 minute walk to Orchard road. The rooms service is horrible. The room can be cleaner but it is compensated but the pool and food. The buffet breakfast is the most expansive I’ve ever seen, with options to cater for all preferences (fruit, cereals, pastries, noodles, curries etc) The entire venue is quiet and peaceful, and all the pool staff are incredibly friendly. Fortunately, both jacuzzi and pool are glorious - with loads of sun chairs and umbrellas by the main pool, and the canopy of trees creating a jungle-like feel. The swim up bar is fantastic. The bar and pool is beautiful. I enjoyed the dip in the pool and it was really refreshing. The

title: Service with a smile
desc: My husband and I had a six night stay in a deluxe club room, from the moment we entered until we left we found it to be faultless, all staff are so professional and pleasant and can’t do enough for you. The property itself is spotless as are the club facilities, a special mention to Gian, Sheril and Ella with whom we had the most interaction, they are very special people and an asset to your hotel,when we left it felt as if we were leaving friends, we look forward to our next visit.

title: A delight!
desc: I have stayed her many times. I am retired now and my memories of my stays are still strong. I loved the hotel, the pools and I ate at The Line almost every day at least 1x. I would go jogging to the Arboretum that was close by and then relax by the pool. It is in a good location and I would walk up and down Orchard either by myself. I was so glad that I brought my wife on one of my longer stays. I would also go to the Shangri-La on Sentosa but I don't think I ever spent the night. I would jog around Sentosa (not too far, ~4-5 miles) then come back and eat at the hotel and lay by their pool for awhile. I hope to come back soon if I can convince my wife :)

title: Singapore's ultimate luxe hotel
desc: Loved every moment of our stay here. We were presented with a fresh orchid upon arrival and taken to our room in the Garden Wing, which had a lovely balcony and view. A basket of fresh fruit was supplied in the room. We loved lounging around the pool - enjoying a fantastic selection of fresh drinks and healthy snacks. Other highlights included the lavish High Tea in the Rose Verandah, and the children's cookery lessons at Buds, which my daughter loved. Service was faultless throughout, staff are unfaililingly charming and helpful. We were even given a complimentary late check-out at 6pm due to a late flight leaving Singapore. Can't praise this hotel highly enough!

title: Peaceful paradise in bustling Singapore
desc: A peaceful paradise in the middle of Singapore. Staff were fantastic from our check-in at the Horizon club through to our departure. Rooms were a good size, very clean and comfortable. Pool and fitness centre were fantastic also. Great bars and restaurants, will be back.

title: Good hospital
desc: Nice hotel in a very beautiful city. The personnel is very helpful and supportive. The facilities are very well cared and comfortable. I enjoyed my stay. Also, the food is well presented and prepared. I enjoyed the stay.

title: An absolutely lovely hotel
desc: everything is excellent here. Service, rooms, food, breakfast, kids breakfast, family oriented, orchid garden, lush environment...the list goes on, and on. the only thing irritating is people who run out at 6 am to grab the best seats around the pool...then they go eat breakfast....if you come down to the pool at 9 am all chairs are taken, but few sit there....(around school holidays, this is...)

title: Probably the best hotel in Singapore with amazing Kids Club and Water Zone
desc: Having moved from a disappointing hotel, we were greeted and treated with high levels of service. Having been here before it was great to feel the warm, professional, quality yet casual service, attention and hospitality. Stayed her with my wife and 3 children under 7 in 2 interconnecting rooms. Amazing pool time even in the rain, walkable to the shops and restaurants. There is an amazing pirate ship, splash pools and water zone for children which could be better signposted as its great! The kids club has also pushed them to lead the pack in Singapore although the cost is expensive even for a hotel guest. Breakfast great, and evening buffet. However I think adding more though to children's food options across the hotel would help parents including better kids menus. All in all

title: Second time in Valley Wing
desc: We revisited the Shangri La after a cruise, we stayed in the Valley Wing as we did in 2007, nothing has changed since our last visit and is immaculately kept. We had afternoon tea followed by champagne and then gin and tonics with canapés There is a reserved sun bed area reserved for Valley Wing guests but unfortunately we did observe other residents from the Garden Wing using the beds, not the hotels fault but the ignorance of other guests. Still our No 1 hotel in Singapore

title: Outstanding Service & Facilities
desc: Simply cannot have a better experience than at this facility. From the effusive welcome in the lobby to the incredible housekeeping services with the most comfortable bedding & plenty of high quality soaps etc to the spectacular dining & fabulous pool area. Whether on business or personal travel - this is the place to be

title: 5 stars service
desc: Since we arrived to the front door, until we departed... everything was perfect. Even we had a very small issue with the room, we were compensated up to highest satisfaction. Rooms are top luxury. The ambiance at lobbies, restaurants, and almost everywhere is top. Special mention to the gardens which are immaculate. Pool is perfect,a s well as the gym which is highly equipped.

title: Loved this Hotel
desc: My wife and I stayed here for a 30th anniversary trip and it turned out to be a perfect choice.To us this is the best hotel in Singapore the location being just that little bit out of the hustle and bustle but at the same time with the complimentary shuttle bus to the MRT everything is very quick to access.There is nothing I can criticise about this place, however the next time we stay which we will definitely endeavour to do we will pay the little bit extra to have a room in the Garden Wing.Top marks to all the staff and management who run this SUPERB hotel

title: Very luxurious
desc: We stayed here 1 night, a stopover on our way home and disappointed we weren't there longer. Will go back and explore more of Singapore. I had the unfortunate incident of losing a purse in a cab, and the Hotel was very helpful in tracking it down. Fabulous customer service, could not recommend this place enough

title: Family friendly
desc: The location is perfect, very close to malls and restaurants. Very helpful and accommodating there. We felt very welcomed. Love how there’s a bird sculpture hanging from the ceiling in the lobby. Breakfast was delicious as well definitely recommend trying!

title: yay for us !
desc: i wish i could have stayed longer in shang SG. 2 nights isn't enough for the good service and delicious food . thumbs up. the buffet is so good. i wish they offer free shuttle services to tour around city but however it doesn't affectvthe overall stay

title: Super hotel in a great location
desc: We stayed for 3 nights at the Shangri-La before moving to an apartment to stay with my daughter and family who came over from New Zealand. We had previously stayed at the chain in Bangkok and we were delighted with our visit in Singapore. The Horizon Club room was beautifully appointed and we enjoyed the amenities in the Club lounge where the staff were attentive and helpful. The swimming pool is a lovely feature and very large by Singapore standards. This is a very nice family hotel - prveious visits to Singapore have been to the Fullerton and the Fairmont and the formwer is possible a better choice for couples. Nevertheless we had a lovely stay and would return with the family.

title: Memorable to the detail
desc: This is a much delayed review for a night staycation that my wife and 6 years old daughter went 3 months ago in June 2019. I'd like to commend the staff at check-in counter at that time. My wife was queueing for checking-in and it was busy afternoon with a lot of people queuing. My wife stayed in the queue and had to watch my daughter at the same time. The staff recognized this and they gave them priority. To my daughter's delights, they gave her a squirrel plush toy named "chubby". They also upgraded the room with tent which my daughter loves it so much to play in the room.

title: Service way beyond the call of duty. 6 stars
desc: Disclosure: I am Golden Circle Diamond member Checked into the Shangrila hotel. Had booked a garden wing room but as I wanted to use my suite upgrade certificate, they gave me a room in the tower wing. Suite was very nice, a tad smaller than other suites I have stayed in, but very well appointed. As a GC Diamond member, checkin was in the room, which was quick and by a very friendly member of the checkin staff. Next day at midnight my wife and daughter arrived, and my daughter was staying in her own room a few doors from my room. I spoke to her when she arrived, and we agreed to meet for breakfast the next morning at 9.30. She's usually very prompt, and when she did not show up in our room, at 9.45 we walked to her room, and were hearing strange wheezing sounds. I tried

title: A good hotel and nice staff
desc: This hotel is really nice . The room is spotless and mostly important the staff there I super friendly and helpful. There is coffee and tea maker in the room which is a bonus. It is pity that I only stayed there for 2 nights. I really enjoy the stay there and will for sure come back. Thanks

title: Feels like a second home
desc: Our 5yo has declared that Shangri-La is “her” hotel- no wonder, as the staff really do make it a point to make her feel at home. This goes beyond the childrens’ amenities - such as a dedicated check in area and the fabulous play and Swimming areas. We, as parents, really appreciate that they take the time to talk to and engage with her. So, all stars as a family friendly hotel. And for travellers without children, don’t worry- the layout and space ensures that the hotel remains tranquil and there is more than enough space for everyone. The rooms are also most definitely clean and spacious, and for families, do request for s room with a sofa bed made up for the children. Although the hotel is not within walking distance to Orchard road, it does provide a complimentary

title: Superb!
desc: Despite the size of the Shangri La hotel, it feels quite personal. Terrific breakfast buffet, pool is great (although it closed at 8pm the night we go there - when we would have love a swim), gym is vast with spa and showers (perfect for a night flight having checked out at midday). Rooms are faultless - every amenity needed. Oh, and the location is superb - Orchard and Tanglin. Botanic Gardens just a 15 min walk!

title: Resort Style Hotel With a Factory Feel
desc: I was attracted by the thought of a green hotel in a garden city. Realistically, bubbling waterfalls, big swimming pools, well kept lawns and a few tennis courts did seem to offer some respite from the hot sticky and busy world outside the hotel gates. We stayed in the Garden wing. We had a beautifully clean room with hardwood floors, opening onto a balcony edged with a sea of bright red flowers. The beds were firm and comfortable. The pillows (so often a weak spot in luxury hotels) were just right. I can recommend the spa. I had a Thai massage and my daughter had a facial. Ultra relaxing and the spa had a serene and calming atmosphere with very skilled staff. Breakfast was included and was awesome in it's variety, quality and quantity. I lost count with over eighteen

title: Perfect way to end our honeymoon
desc: The hotel is delightfully spacious and the view from the 10th floor over-looking the garden makes Singapore look magical. Yana from the 24th floor was lovely and made us feel welcomed. Peter from the lobby was a key staff member when exploring the city and both went above their roles and are a credit to the hotel. Can't wait to return to the shang ri la as a result. Thankyou both.

title: Something superb
desc: -The rooms are excellent and near the orchard road -Breakfast is splendid - There is a bus going to some places which is provided by the hotel at regular intervals. -Very peacful and beautiful hotel...

title: Horizon club Lounge
desc: Stayed at the Shang for three days on my way back from London to Manila. Just want to give a big shout out to Fiola for looking after us so well in the Horizon Club Lounge throughout our stay, and we wish her well with the remainder of her training.

title: Extended CityTrip
desc: A most wonderful hotel. The hotel is very convienients located not too far from the subway. The hotel and Staff are outstanding. We took the Horizon Club Exec room which gave us access to the lounge (my wife and I enjoyed the relaxing vibe there). we also had dinner both at the NAMI (just outstanding) and the Waterfall. I'm already looking forward to my next stay there,

title: What can I say? Service makes a good hotel great!
desc: Shangri-La Singapore is the flagship hotel in the group and it doesn’t disappoint. On arrival we were very pleasantly surprised with the open, inviting decor and atmosphere. The check in procedure was prompt, pleasant and professional. The space is beautiful, especially for a city centre property, although our autistic son did struggle with the way sound travelled around the space (This is unavoidable because of its design but we were able to avoid further distress as after the initial check in we used the Club lounge service centre). Having booked a club level room for a family of 3 I would absolutely recommend that families alternatively opt for a family level room. This was by far the best family level we’ve come across; the laundry room was a pleasant and welcome

title: Great Service and Clean room!!
desc: Wonderful Stay! Everyone was extremely helpful. My kids love the Family Theme Suites! The room was very well maintained and clean. Nice amineties in room and in the family service lounge! Excellent breakfast with many choices. Buds is a very nice place for kids to play!

title: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
desc: It was a different take on Italian buffet for lunch. Everything was very fresh, clean and most loved dishes are available. Also the cleanliness and service of the restaurant was great. They offer fresh pasta too which are made in a station in front of us. I got intrigued with their a la carte menu since their buffet was spot on. I called on one of their cooks that always strolls around the place and checking the food and I asked which one is best. Ms. Carolyn suggested the seafood pasta and true enough it was one of the best I have ever had. I will be back for more dining and ambiance experience at Shangri la Orchard. Especially the restaurant. Cheers!

title: Memorable Stay!
desc: 這是我第一次在這家酒店慶祝我的生日。 非常可紀念，愉快和美好的經驗。 我們決定在NAMI用餐。我們點了壽司，食物很好吃。當我們晚上回到房間時，我們發現了一個生日蛋糕和一張手寫的卡片。工作人員非常出色，讓我們感到特別。 This is my first time to celebrate my birthday in this hotel. Very memoriable, pleasant and nice experience. We decided to have dinenr at NAMI. We ordered sushi omakase and the food was delicious. When we returned to our room in the evening, we foudn a birthday cake and a hand-written card. The staffs are excellent and make us feel special.

title: Just divine, tranquil bliss in the heart of Singapore
desc: If you want to be treated like a VIP then this is the hotel for you. Chose the Garden wing, stay in Bill Clintons room with electric curtains, afternoon tea with Champagne and the best service in the world bar none. This hotel always conjures up the bnest memories having stayed here 3 times now. Fantastic job done by all involved, from housekeeping to front of house, the very best!

title: Outstanding accommodation
desc: Felt warmly welcomed the moment we stepped into this lovely hotel. The check in staff was very professional. In particular, Peter of the foyer has been exceptionally helpful and friendly. We were very touched by his warm gestures. We’ll definitely be back again.

title: Very nice and helpfull staff
desc: Since I got check in we had a very good sevice. No long line up, at that time they get busy because the president of turkmenistan is arrived. And one night I forgot my cell phone on grabcar. I come to consierge, the guy name SIVA SHARMAH talk to me and very quickly try to contact the grab driver. He realy helpfull, he keep in contact with the grab driver and ask me to wait in my room. After 20mnt he call to my room and tell the driver is on the way. Thank you SIVA SHARMAH, i don't know what happened if i didn't meet you. And thank you Shangri La singapore for all of the best service.

title: Wonderful Horizon Club staff!
desc: This is a long overdue review but better late than never. I had very relaxing stay at Shangril- La Hotel and it is mostly due to the wonderful service of the Horizon Club . Since we were there for rest, we enjoyed the amenities of the Horizon Club and was there for high tea and cocktails most of the time. I personally liked the concept of having a separate Family Corner for families that bring their children to the lounge. I would like to thank Viola, Gian and Ella for taking care of us during our stay. No request was too complicated for them and they always served us with a smile. Viola especially took note of the cheese I took a liking to and asked the kitchen if they had more in stock for me. These are little things that make a difference in making a stay memorable for a

title: Very pleasurable stay at the Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore
desc: The hotel is very nice with excellent facilities, it is well-located within walking distance of Orchard Road and the staff are extremely polite, friendly and helpful. Breakfast at the hotel is excellent, with a large selection of food from all over the world. We also tried the Italian restaurant and the food and service very excellent as well. All in all, we had a lovely stay at the Shangri-La Hotel in Singapore and I strongly recommend it.

title: Disappointed
desc: Have stayed at the Shangri La on a number of times and rated it 5 stars and our special place in Singapore. But that was then this is now. The Hotel Foyer has been revamped and as a consequence the hotel has lost its allure. It has a cold impersonal air about it. The staff that were once friendly now seem distant. The Italian Restaurant which we looked forwarded to so much was a flop. Sea Food Marinara was luke warm and noticeable for its lack of sea food. The pasta was undercooked as well which made it difficult to chew. Breakfast was served in the Line and that's what it was. We formed a line and when a table became vacant the race was on to get it. We took turns in guarding our possession and getting our food in competition with quite a large number of fellow guests.

title: piyush chawla
desc: beautiful property at the city centre and i was travelling with the baby so chef were so nice to prepare food as per the baby. chef ayappa was amazing and helpful loved every bit of our stay there. special thank to chef Ayappa and team

title: Shangrila hospitality
desc: Valley Wing, Garden Wing and Tower Wing all have their own and different characters and I would usually stay in the Tower Wing when on business as I feel that it is more suitable for work purposes. There is no doubt that there are many good hotels in SG. But the one and most important distinguishing feature of Shangr-La is their "signature" hospitality. The genuine, helpful, warm, friendly but professional but service is what you can and will receive. Shangri-La is my home. During this visit, I have spent many hours in the hotel and the outlets (namely Origin and Waterfall). Remember to ask the Chef Daniel from Waterfall for the special menu of the day. I had a grilled fish last time and the only complaint I had was that my stomach space was too small for another one.

title: Excellent service and very clean
desc: Excellent all round. The staff were exceptionally helpful and friendly especially Yana and all the staff at reception. The room cleaners went out of their way by opening doors and lifts for us and the hotel porters were very professional and hospitable. As for the room... it was very clean and comfortable with had a beautiful view. The breakfast in the hotel was delicious and again the staff at breakfast couldn't do enough for us. It had something for everyone from the family area to the health section we were not left hungry!! The entire atmostphere in the hotel was lovely and I look forward to my next stay there.

title: The best place in Singapore
desc: The best hotel in Singapore, quiet and close to Orchard by foot 10 min max. Service is really good. In breakfaset buffet a large choice of gluten free stuff which is great. Room are nice and view is amazing.

title: A delightful holiday
desc: We had a delightful stay at the Shangri La Singapore in August. The warm welcome we received at check-in felt as though we were coming home and we looked forward to the rest of our stay which was splendid. The activities for the kids and the pool was great as were the Horizon Club Lounge which had great service, food and cocktails and of course beautiful views of the Singapore skyline. The rooms in the Garden wing were beautifully appointed and the we simply enjoyed every moment at the Hotel. Will definitely recommend the Shangri La and will certainly be first choice in Singapore....

title: Great hospitality
desc: I have heard about this hotel service from my father since our first trip there more than 30 years ago, I was amused by the accommodation and hospitality by their friendly staff especially by Mr. Peter at the lobby whom warmly welcomed me and my family along our full length of stay.

title: Excellent
desc: We had a wonderful stay for two nights at the Valley Wing. Nothing more to expect, very friendly and helpful staff, excellent food and beverages, perfect accommodation. Highly recommended for a relaxed and stressless stay in Singapore

title: Wonderful hotel, great staff and excellent location
desc: Stayed here for 4 nights as part of our honeymoon and so glad we did. Beautiful hotel, great location and easy to walk to one end of Orchard Road (big shopping area). Room was great and breakfast lovely. Will be back and would recommend every time.

title: Fantastic stay!!
desc: We had a lovely stay, it was such a lovely room with a fantastic view!! The location was ideal and easily accessible! Peter from the lobby looked after us amazingly & made us feel so welcome!! Thank you very much :)

title: Excellent Service!
desc: I had a fantastic stay at the Garden Wing made special by the hotel‘s professional staff, from arrival and through out the end of our stay. Special mention to Mica at the lobby who was very helpful and friendly as well as the team in The Line during breakfast! Although the restaurant is always busy, staff still makes an effort to acknowledge you, plus, great selection of food offering!

title: Best Feast in Town @ The LINE!
desc: Been to The Line many times last year and just came back for family gathering. The spread was still remain great as before with lots of options including oysters, wagyu and new station, Thai cuisine. Staffs were very friendly from welcoming to farewell. The restaurant manager, Stiefen visited our table and ensure if we all have happy tummy. He also helped us to take a group photo and personally brought us some Indian dishes fresh from the kitchen to our table. Overall, we will certainly come back for another occasions!

title: Amazing stay !,,
desc: Just had 2 nights here on route home and wow!! Stayed in a valley suite 660,it was truly stunning!!! lounge,bedroom,and bathroom were just beautiful, the staff were incredible and made our wedding anniversary so memorable , we cannot thank you enough 🙏🏻 and will most definitely return in the not too distant future 🤞🤞🌞

title: Vegaterian/Vegan/Gym
desc: We have tried all the luxury hotels in Singapore. We have found Shangri-La to be the most helpful, most selection and clearly signed for vegan/vegetarian/lacto- vegetarian diets. Indran at the Gym was very helpful by clearly showing where the facilities are. This made the experience non-threatening as it can be at some gyms.

title: Perfect place to stay
desc: As the flagship Shangri-La hotel worldwide, SL SG truly delivers the highest SL standard. Check-in process was smooth and every of my needs from the hotel was taken care of promptly. Will definately consider staying here in my future trips.

title: Consistently excellent for so many years..
desc: I have been staying at the Shangri La Singapore since 1994....I was a regular there several times a year for business purposes as Singapore was our newly established hub. Now I have retired to NZ and don’t travel for business anymore....I decided that en route to the UK to visit family I would stay at the Shangri La for 3 nights to break up the journey. The incredible high standard of customer service has not changed one bit...The Hotel is impeccable in its manner warmly welcoming you at the door and it is same at reception.Staying in the Tower Wing, The rooms are generously luxurious and will make any long trip less stressful. Superb large pool - really loved being back here and will be again on my return journey in October - Highly recommended.

title: Fantastic buffet
desc: One of the finest and best buffets in Singapore for sure. Located near Orchard Road and nestled in a beautiful rain forest it serves a great variety of foods from Asian to Western to Middle Eastern. Go!

title: A lovely place to stay
desc: We couldn’t have asked for more. Beautiful suite, pool, wonderful staff who couldn’t do enough, topped off by special touches in our room to celebrate our wedding anniversary and use of The Horizon Club (best Laksa ever!).

title: I need Green which is why I alwasy stay at the Singapore Shangri-La
desc: A spacious room with a very comfy bed! I stayed at other hotels in Singapore, but this property remains my favorite by far! Staff is so discrete and friendly. The breakfast offers so many options. The pool is great with very attentive staff (including pool guards should you bring your little one's). Orchard Road is walking distance. I will be back!

title: The ultimate remarkable family holiday
desc: We stayed in the Horizon club junior suite. It exceeded all of our expectations, and we had very high expectations after staying in very good hotels in the past. No one as good as this one. The room was absolutely amazing and comfortable, always clean and someone came to check if we need anything every day, the buds for kids was very helpful for us as family with children. The fact that this is also very family oriented was major consideration for us. The friendly staff and the check in process. Even though we arrived early, we were taken immediately to the lounge and were allowed to use all facilities. Didn’t happen to me in any hotel so far where nothing was allowed before room was ready and official check in time. Thank you very much and I am sure we will be back again.

title: Amazing hotel
desc: Can’t say that this is 50 year old hotel. A hotel with great staff. I particularly would like to mention two names Ketki (AFOM) and Sanjay Nautiyal from sales. Amazing leaders and truly guest centric. Keep it up guys.

title: Great Stay
desc: We stayed there overnight in the Garden Wing rooms on two occasions in September. The rooms were large and very nice, if a little dated, but very comfortable and well appointed nonetheless. They have usable balconies overlooking the pool and gardens. The pool area is very nice. Lots of lounges and enough with shade. We had dinner at the Italian Restaurant which was also very good. Service at check in / out and poolside was friendly and very helpful - special thanks to Itz.

title: Started Badly ending great
desc: On our trip to Europe we stayed at Shangri La Singapore on the way over for 2 nights and on the way back also 2 nights. Before leaving Perth I had emailed Shangri-La (and many other hotels) about whether or not they took credit card pre authorisations upon arrival. I was answered back in writing no they do not. I had pre paid my accommodation. So we arrived, were greeted beautifully, upgraded to a suite which was fantastic. After being shown to suite i was asked for credit card for pre authorisation. I explained i had asked this and was told no in writing this doesn't happen. Greeter said ok no problems and off she went. So we go down to pool, have a swim then order a drink. We got drinks then went for another swim. Whilst swimming one of the pool guys said to us you need

title: Stayed and conducted company meeting
desc: Our stay with Shangri-La was excellent. The staff were helpful and excited to support. The rooms were great and conference room was well prepared. Our stay was for four nights and conducted two meetings in the hotel

title: Great Hotel
desc: Lovely hotel and in a quiet area and close to orchard road and easy to get around singapore. The room was lovely and overlooked the amazing gardens and pool. Used the gym which was good and well equipped and lovely changing rooms. This is a hotel of quality. Room was lovely and had everything we needed. Housekeeping was excellent. Had drinks in the lobby and bought some food from the bakery and pizza from the restaurant downstairs.It is a great hotel if you just want to relax. Staff were all so lovely could not fault this hotel at all. Will definitely return

title: Nice hotel with all amenities and courteous staff
desc: I stayed for 9 days on a business trip. Conveniently located on orchard road (just 0.4 miles) to the shopping area. Staff is very courteous and they take care of special requests for you. Hotel has all amenities in room except microwave. Restaurants are quite good too.

title: F1 Singapore Trip
desc: Always the best place to stay when you are in town for the Formula 1. The staff are fantastic,they always great you with a smile. To top it off, the food is great and the accommodation is first class.

title: Luxury for the entire family
desc: We had an amazing time at a staycation for our little family. Asian hospitality is unparalleled but Singapore often lags behind in this area - Shangri-La proved it otherwise. It is one of the most child friendly hotels I've ever stayed at, without compromising on luxury. The hotel staff were extremely accommodating (I was a strict detox and they went out of their way to cater to my idiosyncrasies). Excellent food options (without breaking the bank), leafy but central neighbourhood, a ton of activities for children and beautiful newly renovated rooms - we will definitely go back!

title: Best MICE Hotel In Singapore
desc: I worked with Sales and Events Manager all over Asia for Meeting & Incentive Groups. Mercadia Wong and Aisyah Ahmad are amongst the best hotelier you can work with. Their attention to details and swift response are rarely found in modern world.

title: Amazing stay
desc: Amazing and comfortable stay from the reception till the end. Got an early check in very comfortably. The rooms were neat and spacious. Beds were really comfortable. Washrooms had a bathtub separate than the bath area and was nicely spacious. The best part was the food. Amazing spread be it for the breakfast or lunch. The taste was not that great atleast for the Indian food which I can vouch for. Tasted continental stuff as well. Desserts were just amazing and ample. Liked the sorbets and the geleto they have

title: Personal Trainer at the Gym
desc: With all the delicious food, I needed to workout and personal trainer Jason helped. He is extremely approachable after a quick analysis he managed to tailor each session according to my needs and limitations. They were enjoyable and fun with new routines. He has an extensive knowledge on the human anatomy. He is passionate and finds great fulfilment in seeing progress for his clients.

title: Superb hospitality from concierge
desc: My family and friends were at Shangri la Singapore to dine at The Line. After dinner we approached the concierge, Johnny at the lobby to help us to take a photo. He not only kindly obliged, but even recommended to assist to take more than 1 shot at various spots that were "Shangri-la signature" in the lobby. After which, he proceeded to engage with my child and gave her toy. It was excellent service given that we only required a simple photo. But he went above and beyond to put a smile on his guests. It is truly a privilege to have him as your staff. For recognition purpose, I was there on 9 September at around 9.45pm. Thanks Johnny! You have given us memories of a lifetime in the few photos.

title: absolutely amazing in the heart of singapore
desc: fast check in excellent location great service - help with storing luggage post , taxis etc lounge area is nice with ample space and silence for business meetings coffee shop is also decent nice pool, quiet rooms, polite staff & good views

title: Lovely place to chillax
desc: Stay in Shang Singapore for 3 nights, absolutely love their services and buffet (both breakfast and night) The dinner buffet is a bit more on the pricey side but consider the quality and variety of food, its definitely worth it. Service was great, the room I stayed in was spacious and bright. Will definitely stay again.

title: Why stay anywhere else!
desc: Had an amazing 2 night stay at the Shangri-la! Visited with my 2 year old daughter and wife this hotel is perfect for business travellers and families alike. The breakfast was amazing with a great selection. We were fortunate it be in the newly renovated family floor which is perfect for anyone travelling with kids

title: Can’t wait to be back!
desc: Beautiful refurbished rooms which are well-appointed and have everything you need+ friendly service throughout the hotel. Housekeeping does a wonderful job with refreshing the rooms daily! Our only complaint is that the gym is antiquated and needs an upgrade to complement the rest of the hotel (machines are outdated and maybe more callisthenics equipment could be added).

title: Top notch service, quality fittings and fixtures
desc: Stayed at the Horizon Club for one night. It was a fantastic experience. Spacious room - king sized bed, bath tub, walk-in shower, glass closet, and a work desk with a view overlooks the greenery and bungalows nearby. L’Occitane toiletries add an additional touch of luxury. The bed deserves a special mention! Sinking into the plush mattress and duvet was a heavenly feeling. Claiming that I slept like a baby through the night is not an exaggeration. The Horizon Club was wonderful. Warm and professional service from the staff. The kitchen uses high quality produce for the food. Good selection of breads, cheeses, and wine. Iberico ham was freshly sliced - savory, with a hint of sweetness. Nothing rancid. The desserts deserve special mention - kueh lapis (local layered cake)

title: Wow - JUST WOW
desc: What a fantastic reception we received once arriving. Nur Sarah Binte Abdul Razak is an absolute stand out member of the team. We have experienced many luxury hotels and Sarah surpasses all this! Absolutely first class. Thankyou!

title: Something bad and something good. All thanks to God!
desc: Something bad and something good. I lost my celfon yesterday, in a taxi that dropped me off a place, no receipt, no record of plate num, no nothing, nada. You know that instant feeling of ‘panic’, and especially losing this in a foreign land... oh it was the leadt that I needed. Until the next day this hotel concierge and another staff manage to track my trip to this lady driver who with gladness happy to see me happy that I have it back. Thank you so much! Now let me say further that Singaporeans are honest and orderly. And its also all worth staying in this hotel too. Copy furnished the Trip Advisor, Shangri-la Hotel Singapore, For Johnny Hor and Nur Sarah Binte Abdul Razak
